### Worked Examples

<h3> Worked Example 1</h3>


A random variable $X$ which can be used in certain circumstances as a model for claim sizes has cumulative distribution function
\[\LARGE F(x) = \begin{cases}
0 & \mbox{ where }  x < 0 \\ 
1 - \left(\frac{2}{(2+x)}\right)^3 & \mbox{ where }  x > 0 \\ 
\end{cases}
\]

<h4> Exercises </h4>

a.  Calculate the value of the conditional probability $\LARGE P(X > 3|X > 1)$.
